Title: Creating a StackHut Service
Description:
In this screencast we show how you can quickly build and deploy a service to StackHut - a platform we've been hacking on for deploying local code as live APIs in the cloud.

More details can be found in the tutorial.

Check the associated screencast to see how you can use a StackHut service.

Give it a try at StackHut and let us know how you get on :).
